trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZD015_03422_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Kenn Beq is feeling every one of his years.
TEXT_LUCKZD015_03422_TODO_00<tab>Slay a green glider for its tail.
TEXT_LUCKZD015_03422_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the green glider tail to Kenn Beq.
TEXT_LUCKZD015_03422_KENNBEQ_000_000<tab>Ah, if it isn't a young one, fairly bursting with vigor. Will you not hear the plea of this tired old amaro?
TEXT_LUCKZD015_03422_KENNBEQ_000_001<tab>To the south of Wolekdorf, there abide winged lizards known as green gliders. I would be grateful if you hunt one and bring me its tail.
TEXT_LUCKZD015_03422_KENNBEQ_000_002<tab>As many winters as I've seen, I no longer have the agility to chase them down. Rest assured you will not go unrewarded for your troubles.
TEXT_LUCKZD015_03422_KENNBEQ_000_003<tab>Green gliders are known to inhabit the area to the south of here. If you could bring me its tail, I would be grateful.
TEXT_LUCKZD015_03422_KENNBEQ_000_010<tab>Ah, the young one returns from the hunt.
TEXT_LUCKZD015_03422_KENNBEQ_000_011<tab>Oho, such a plump, juicy tail this is! Thank you, thank you. These are a favorite of mine.
TEXT_LUCKZD015_03422_KENNBEQ_000_012<tab>Before I came to be here, I was in Lakeland. There I lived amidst men for many years.

TEXT_LUCKZD015_03422_KENNBEQ_000_013<tab>In the time before the Flood, a great battle was joined at the Source. With my master upon my back, I charged into the fray against the forces of the Shadowkeeper.

TEXT_LUCKZD015_03422_KENNBEQ_000_014<tab>Countless many fell that day. Though I was fortunate to escape with my life, I did not escape wholly unscathed, taking grievous wounds at the hands of enemy soldiers who had assumed wolflike forms.

TEXT_LUCKZD015_03422_KENNBEQ_000_015<tab>Such were my injuries, it was believed I would never walk again, never mind fly. Yet my master never forsook me. He nursed me back to health, feeding me a nutritious diet of green glider tails, and I eventually made a full recovery.

TEXT_LUCKZD015_03422_KENNBEQ_000_016<tab>Seeing the tail now, I cannot help but be reminded of those golden days. The days I spent with the elvenfolk. Thank you, young one, for giving me the chance to relive them.
